text: mi khey prak d kæ bukhkhl dı thi xallxhˌ thrng prathan khamphir læa khx tadsin læa kar pen na bi kæ khea læw khea klaw kæ phukhn wa than thanghlay cng pen baw khxng chan xun ca kxallxhˌ hak tæ (khea ca klaw wa) than thanghlay cng pen phu thi phukphan kab phracea theid neuxngcak kar thi phwk than khey sxn khamphir læa khey suksʹa khamphir ma
